email_sender_microservice

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • email_sender_microservice.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The Server implements a Spark application that simply reads the connectionPropertyValues from a connection.properties and uses it to connect to the database.

    DBprops contains the emails that you want to use to send mails from.

    Since:
    2016-01-10

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Starts the server with the given port in args.

        Setups the connection between the database and the microservice.

        Creates tables and DAOs for Email and Client models. Contains the possible routes for the application.

        Parameters:
        args - only the first element is used.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.sql.SQLException - on database access error.
        See Also:
        SQLException
